text_block_list.text:
On the day off. To cheer up the depressed Princess Kawakami, 
I went to the streets for a "preliminary inspection" by myself…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Sigh～～～～……

―Just then, I heard a tremendous sigh, like an avalanche, from 
Kawakami Princess.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……Oh, my! ? Trainer!? What are you doing here?
choice_data_list: ……looks like you're pretty bummed out.
……sounds like you're pretty bummed out.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Because, because, because ……! I'm so frustrated! 
I'm mad about the things that mean person said……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She's exactly like the leader of the dark Uma Musume 
"Dark Princess" from Princess Fighter!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe I lost to someone like that～ ! It's a bad 
ending! It's a depressing ending! I've been downgraded from 
princess to scallop pimp～!

Kawakami Princess seemed to be in a bigger 
shock than I expected. If that's the case - we 
might as well go to "that place" right now.
choice_data_list: I have a place I'd like to take you to……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh? To where?
choice_data_list: You'll find out when we get there
You'll find out when we get there

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Howa～～～～!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
T… Trainer……! This panel ……! Isn't 
this the uncut PriFi theater version!?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: How come ……! ? The movie was released years ago?
choice_data_list: Found a cinema that's showing it again.
Found a cinema that's showing it again.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Does that mean…… We can watch Pri-Fi right now? 
On a big screen?
choice_data_list: Of course!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……Yes!!! I'm soooooooooooooo excited!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
This is awesome, trainer! 
Let's head to the theater now～!
…… Apparently, her mood is up again!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Mmmm……! I'm filled with emotions～……!
choice_data_list: I'm glad you're happy.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
It was the best! I knew it, the uncut PriFi movie version is an 
immortal masterpiece! I got so excited I almost broke 
the armrest!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ah～ the scene where the princess, surrounded by a billion dark Uma Musume troops, runs through the satellite orbit guided 
by the light emitted by the prince～……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
And that scene where she and the Prince purified the Dark 
Nebula Empire that merged with the black hole on the course of the moon! 
It always makes me emotional matter how many times I see it～!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ha～ that was really fun…… really……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
choice_data_list: What's up?
What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……A real princess should be able to work wonders with her 
prince like that after all…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: And yet, I was easily defeated by someone like Dark Princess…… ……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
This doesn't qualify me as a princess.…… I'll end up becoming 
an average person in the streets at this point ……
choice_data_list: ……There's a scene I'd like to remind you of.
……There's a scene I'd like to remind you of.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh? Which scene are you talking about……?
choice_data_list: Scene just before the climax

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
The part where Princess and her trainer were about to enter 
the race for the fate of the planet……?

…… Yes. The final conversation between 
the trainer and the princess in a hopeless situation, before 
going to the final battle.

text_block_list.name: Princess Fighter
text_block_list.text:
―Is there nothing we can do? 
Are we unable to save the planet……!?

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text: ―No, we still have a race to run!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text: ―No, we still have a race to run

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
…… Listen, Princess. I'm sure you're aware of this. Just 
us two working hard is not enough to create a 
miracle… But!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
…… Listen, Princess. I'm sure you're aware of this. Just 
us two working hard is not enough to create a 
miracle… But!

text_block_list.name: Princess Fighter
text_block_list.text:
………… It's when we accept our weakness as well as our 
strength…… That's when…!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Yes, you can do far more than you are capable 
of…… That's what is called―a real miracle!

text_block_list.name: Legendary Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Yes, you can do far more than you are capable 
of…… That's what is called―a real miracle!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
（"So Let's Go! To the Race, that awaits!"…… Hmmm! That's 
one of the best scenes in the movie!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
（"So Let's Go! To the Race, that awaits!"…… Hmmm! That's 
one of the best scenes in the movie!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (…… hm, oh, wait! I remember that time when I…!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Oh don't worry! We don't need a strategy! Because…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
You and I have the power of our invincible "bond"! Please 
believe in me and wait for me here～!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
choice_data_list: Hey, are you okay?
Hey, you're okay!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I…… was totally gung-ho and full of nonsense ……! 
To think that miracles can happen just by working hard……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I've seen the Pri-Fi movie version dozens and dozens of times, 
and yet ……! I can't believe I forgot about the most important 
part…!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ugh～……! I'm so embarrassed I feel like smashing through 
the ground right now and retreating into the hole I've 
created……!
choice_data_list: It's all right! We're just getting started!
It's all right! We're just getting started!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: What……?

We have only just met 'ourselves'. In other words, 
in…… Pri-Fi term, we're only at episode 6. This is only the 
beginning.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
……you're right! You are absolutely right! Even Princess 
didn't start out as a perfect princess……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She got so sick of training that she ran away from home to a 
deserted island.…… and also crushed the precious dumbbell 
that the craftsmen made for her!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
But she would talk to the prince, and get to know each other 
better… It took 49 episodes for the Princess to mature……!
choice_data_list: Why don't we do the same?
Why don't we do the same?

text_block_list.text:
―I am just starting out, and I am far from being a "legendary 
trainer. However, I hope to grow together with you Kawakami.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
…… Okay! By all means! Let's go down the princess road 
together!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I… would also like to know more about you! 
My trainer who's also my prince!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
There's still so much I don't know about you! From your 
favorite clothes, to your favorite ramen toppings, 
to your favorite muscle training equipment!
choice_data_list: I'd like to know more about you as well.
I'd like to know more about you as well.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Of course! I'll tell you everything! About my childhood 
and about my mother and father!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
And then…… we'll obtain the true "bonding" power of the 
princess and the prince! And then we'll unleash it on the 
racetrack!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Hah～ I'm so motivated right now!! 
Kawakami Princess! She's back～～～～!
